data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-1
data.title: Policies and Objectives

content.content: The Board of Directors of the Company shall guide the Company's strategy, supervise the management, and be responsible to the Company and its shareholders. All operations and arrangements of its corporate governance system shall ensure that the Board of Directors exercises its powers in accordance with laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, or resolutions of the shareholders' meeting.

The structure of the board of directors of this Corporation shall determine the appropriate number of directors of four or more persons, taking into account the needs of practical operations, based on the size of the operation and development of the Corporation and the shareholding of its major shareholders.

data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-2

content.content: The composition of the board of directors should consider diversity. In addition to the fact that more than half of the directors should not have a relationship of spouse or second-degree relationship, an appropriate diversity plan should be formulated according to their own operation, operation type and development needs, which should include But not limited to the following two standards:
Basic conditions and values: gender, age, nationality and culture.
Expertise and Skills: professional background (e.g. law, accounting, industry, finance, marketing or technology), professional skills and industry experience.

data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-3
data.content: Members of the Board shall be generally equipped with the knowledge, skills and accomplishments necessary to perform their duties. In order to achieve the ideal goal of corporate governance, the overall capacity of the Board is as follows:

data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-4

content.content: Ability to judge and make business call.
Capabilities for accounting and financial analysis.

data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-5
data.title: Implementation situation

content.content: The 11th Board of Directors is composed of 7 directors, including 3 independent directors. At present, the members are professional in finance, business and management.
The composition of the board of directors focuses on gender equality. At present, the proportion of female directors is 14%.
Pay attention to the independence of independent directors. The target is that at least two independent directors will serve no more than nine consecutive years. The target has been achieved.

data.block_title: Implementation of Diversity of Board Members Policy-6

content.content: Term of office Concurrently serving as an employee of the Company
